description: Maps high-fidelity visualizations to theoretical sections for paper injection

injections.title: Dimensional Descent
injections.anchor_text: transition from the 26D bosonic string vacuum to the 11D M-theory limit
injections.caption: Figure 1: The recursive folding of the 26D Leech Lattice into the 11D Supergravity limit via G2 compactification.

injections.title: The G2 Holonomy
injections.anchor_text: associative 3-form calibration and the co-associative 4-form residue
injections.caption: Figure 2: Geometric representation of the G2 manifold, highlighting the associative cycles (b3=24) that determine gauge coupling residues.

injections.title: Renormalization Group Flow
injections.anchor_text: running of the fine structure constant from the Planck scale to MZ
injections.caption: Figure 3: 3-Loop RG evolution of alpha^-1 showing the transition from the bare G2 residue to the CODATA laboratory value.
injections.v16_2_notes: Uses Radau method with first_step=1e-12 for numerical stability

injections.title: Neutrino Mass Hierarchy
injections.anchor_text: sum of neutrino masses constrained by the octonionic volume suppression
injections.caption: Figure 4: Normal Hierarchy octonionic scaling from v16.2 (IO experimental values, theta_g golden angle constraint).
injections.v16_2_notes: Updated from Inverted to Normal Hierarchy per NuFIT 6.0

injections.title: CKM Unitarity Triangles
injections.anchor_text: Jarlskog invariant as a geometric area within the symplectic boundary
injections.caption: Figure 5: The CKM Unitary Triangle showing the v16.2 CP phase from doubled golden angle (2*theta_g = 63.44 deg).
injections.v16_2_notes: CP phase derived from 2*arctan(1/phi), see Appendix H

injections.title: Dark Energy Thawing
injections.anchor_text: thawing equation of state w(z) aligned with DESI 2025 cusp data
injections.caption: Figure 6: w0-wa parameter space showing PM-v16.2 thawing prediction (w0=-0.9583, wa=-0.204) at 0.02 sigma from DESI 2025.
injections.v16_2_notes: Essential for DESI 2025 alignment. w0=-1+1/b3, wa=-1/sqrt(b3), see Appendix G

injections.title: Structure Formation
injections.anchor_text: S8 clustering suppression induced by torsional metric pressure
injections.caption: Figure 7: The matter power spectrum comparing Lambda-CDM clustering with the PM-v16.2 torsional damping result (S8=0.766).

injections.title: Cosmic Microwave Background
injections.anchor_text: acoustic peak shifts in the high-ell regime
injections.caption: Figure 8: CMB Power Spectrum showing v16.2 alignment with Planck 2018/2025 TT-TE-EE datasets.

obsolete_visualizations.title: Static GUT Unification (OBSOLETE)
obsolete_visualizations.reason: Replaced by logarithmic RG flow. Tree-level approximation invalid in 3-loop framework.

obsolete_visualizations.title: Inverted Hierarchy Density (OBSOLETE)
obsolete_visualizations.reason: Replaced by Normal Hierarchy logic per NuFIT 6.0 / PDG 2024.

appendix_g.title: Non-Linear Ricci Flow and Redshift Anchors
appendix_g.key_result: w(z) = w0 + wa * z/(1+z) with z=2.0 Ricci flow anchor
